Extensions.​effects

Extension functions for the effects library.

Functions
Sparks
function effects.Sparks(
pos,
dir,
amount,
size,
trailLength,
ignoreFilter
)

Emits a set of sparks at a given location, shorthand for creating the 'Sparks' effect.

Parameters
Vector pos

The position to emit the sparks from.

Vector dir

The direction to emit the sparks in.

number amount

The amount of sparks to emit, the total amount is equal to amount * amount * math.Rand(2 * 4)

number size

The size of the sparks.

number trailLength

The length of each spark's 'tail'

any? ignoreFilter

Identical to the ignoreFilter argument of util.Effect.
